statements: SELECT * FROM SensorReadings;
SELECT reading_id, sensor_id, reading_value FROM SensorReadings ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, reading_value FROM SensorReadings WHERE reading_value > 50;
SELECT reading_id, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM SensorReadings WHERE sensor_id = 'ef72e3a2-588f-4c17-8d64-9d227fc4f24e';
SELECT * FROM SensorReadings WHERE reading_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM SensorReadings ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(reading_value) AS max_value FROM SensorReadings GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM SensorReadings WHERE reading_value > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(reading_id) AS total_readings FROM SensorReadings GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY total_readings DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(reading_value) AS average_value FROM SensorReadings GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING average_value > 30;
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, reading_value FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY reading_value DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(reading_value) AS avg_reading FROM sensor_readings GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(reading_value) > 50;
SELECT s.sensor_name, sr.reading_value, s.location FROM sensors s JOIN sensor_readings sr ON s.sensor_id = sr.sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors;
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_value > 50 ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(reading_value) FROM sensor_readings GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(reading_value) > 40;
SELECT sensor_id, reading_value FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_value BETWEEN 30 AND 60;
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(value) AS average_value FROM sensor_readings GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_id, SUM(value) AS total_value FROM sensor_history WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS num_readings FROM sensor_readings WHERE value > 50;
SELECT sensors.location, AVG(sensor_readings.value) AS average_value FROM sensors JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id GROUP BY sensors.location;
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, SUM(value) AS total_value FROM sensor_readings GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING SUM(value) > 100;
SELECT s.location, sh.timestamp, sh.value FROM sensors s INNER JOIN sensor_history sh ON s.sensor_id = sh.sensor_id WHERE sh.timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT sh.value, sr.timestamp FROM sensor_history sh LEFT JOIN sensor_readings sr ON sh.sensor_id = sr.sensor_id AND sh.timestamp = sr.timestamp;
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY type, location DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, value FROM sensor_readings WHERE value > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensors WHERE type = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, metadata_key, metadata_value FROM sensor_metadata WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM sensor_aggregates WHERE average_value < 20 ORDER BY start_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(value) FROM sensor_readings GROUP BY sensor_id
SELECT sensors.location, sensor_metadata.metadata_key, sensor_metadata.metadata_value FROM sensors JOIN sensor_metadata ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_metadata.sensor_id
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(value) AS average_value FROM sensor_aggregates WHERE start_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' GROUP BY sensor_id

SELECT sensor_trends.trend_name, COUNT(sensor_id) AS total_sensors FROM sensor_trends JOIN sensor_aggregates ON sensor_trends.trend_id = sensor_aggregates.aggregate_id GROUP BY sensor_trends.trend_name ORDER BY total_sensors DESC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_name, reading_time FROM sensor_data ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM sensor_data WHERE reading_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM sensor_location WHERE latitude < 10.0 AND longitude > 70.0;
SELECT sensor_id, type_name FROM sensor_type ORDER BY type_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY reading_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_name, reading_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND reading_value > 50 ORDER BY reading_time ASC;

SELECT s.sensor_name, t.type_name, l.location_name FROM sensor_data s JOIN sensor_location l ON s.sensor_id = l.sensor_id JOIN sensor_type t ON s.sensor_id = t.sensor_id WHERE l.latitude < 40 AND l.longitude > -100;
SELECT s.sensor_name, a.alert_message, a.alert_time FROM sensor_data s JOIN sensor_alert a ON s.sensor_id = a.sensor_id ORDER BY a.alert_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_id FROM sensor_status WHERE status_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
